class server.app.game.forms.RulesForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_wtf.form.FlaskForm

Rules form

Variables

  • room_name – room name

  • pwd – room password

  • players_amount – amount of players in a room

  • bots_amount – amount of players in a room

  • is_not_rect – field has random form if True

  • is_separated_armory – different cells for Weapon and Explosive armory

  • is_same_wall_outer_concrete – if true you won’t know difference between WallConcrete and WallOuter

  • submit – submit field

class server.app.game.models.GameRoom(rules_form, creator)¶

Bases: sqlalchemy.orm.decl_api.Model

This is a Game Room model. Its contains information about game

Variables

  • name – name of a room

  • pwd – password of a room

  • rules – rules for a room

  • date – date of room creation

  • creator_id – id of room creator

  • game – game object

  • is_running – running state

  • is_ended – ended state
